backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no exposed methods.
feature_evidence.json: Describes a feature request to increase the hero logo size in frontend/src/App.tsx and lists related components and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Maps frontend file paths to short summaries describing their roles, including App.tsx, global CSS, Tailwind config, and an SVG background asset.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variable definitions with OKLCH colors, dark mode overrides, and global body styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React page rendering hero slider, services, trust points, brands, and contact actions with auto-rotating images.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, login flow, and stored identities.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS variables, dark mode settings, typography, and utilities including a repeated background texture.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry file initializing QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending colors from CSS variables, typography, spacing, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s versioned state, design constraints, known issues, and required features for a mobile-first one-page website for Gadget Zone. Includes architectural notes, feature list, and integration rules for WhatsApp, contact actions, and visual guidelines.
